basic.description: In this course, BA students in their final year of study have the opportunity to use knowledge and skills learned earlier in their studies and apply these toward a summative exhibition. The various ways others who have earned a BA in studio art have found to apply their experiences toward their future endeavors are discussed. The course also includes guest who talk about a full range of opportunities and resources, as well as an exploration of some basic tools for sustaining a life in the arts post-graduation.
